EmailTemplate.name: 202008_EMEAI_ATR_HAT_FGI_Gated_MC.202011_EMEAI_FGI_Discounted_Parts_Used
EmailTemplate.subject: List of Honeywell Discounted Parts
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for your interest in Honeywell Discounted Spares Sale.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell_Discounted_Parts_Used_Nov.xlsx]]> to access the list of discounted parts. Please note that this is a limited period offer and parts are subject to availability, on a first come, first served basis. The list of discounted parts is meant for limited circulation and you are advised not share the list/link with people outside your organization.
To request a quote for the parts you need, please send an email to prashant.malik@honeywell.com <[[mailto:prashant.malik@honeywell.com]]>.
